name: KILL FALL DANCE DIE
description:
Hello

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together".

So I went with the idea of having multiple minigames playing at the same time. They are joined together as one ! I developed some action minigames and some weird minigame in the style of Wario Ware, it's a mix !

Every piece of visual art and most coding were made within the jam in 48h by myself. Only the sound effects and music were taken from the web. Speaking of that, here's the credits to author of the amazing song : Cluster Block by FoxSynergy

I hope you like it, don't forget to leave a comment :D

Controls

Only the 'WASD' keys, the 'ENTER' key and the left mouse button are needed to play. Their functions varies and are specified within the game !
